translations: v.<文>发生；发生（或降临）在（某人）身上（betide 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Metastasis(5 cases)tumor betided single(3 cases)or double side(2 cases)with even or uneven density.
sentences.translation: 转移癌5例，2例双侧，3例单侧，密度均匀或不均匀。

sentences.sentence: The majority ethylism is betided to drink liquor. Ethanol has severe injury effect in the developmenting cerebrum, nevertheless, the mechanism of action is still dimness.
sentences.translation: 绝大多数乙醇中毒发生于饮酒，乙醇对发育中大脑有严重的损伤作用，但其作用机制尚不清楚。
